name: One Last Flight (One Game a Week)
name_original: One Last Flight (One Game a Week)
description:
A top down shooter with somewhat unique movement and combat.

This game was made as a part of a "Make One Game Per Week" Challenge I decided to impose on myself. I talk more about the challenge and making this game in a blog:

https://davidvinogamedesign.wordpress.com/

This is my first try at making a game completely on my own in a single week, which explains why it feels like it could've been better with some more time. However, I'd still love to listen to your feedback. Have fun!
